New Records: Cade Cunningham reached.500 for the first time after New Year’s Day since 2019 with the Detroit Pistons’ win
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham had 32 points and nine assists as the Detroit Pistons reached.500 for the first time after New Year’s Day since 2019 with a 118-115 win over the Portland Trail Blazers
Others: The game was played on Monday, Jan. 6, 2025, in Detroit.
